verses.name: Jeremiah 48:26
verses.text: Make ye him drunken: for he magnified himself against the Lord: Moab also shall wallow in his vomit, and he also shall be in derision.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:27
verses.text: For was not Israel a derision unto thee? was he found among thieves? for since thou spakest of him, thou skippedst for joy.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:28
verses.text: O ye that dwell in Moab, leave the cities, and dwell in the rock, and be like the dove that maketh her nest in the sides of the hole’s mouth.
